                  def destroy
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    if request.headers['Authorization'].nil?
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      render json: { success: false, message: I18n.t('errors.messages.authentication.unauthorized') },
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                             status: :unauthorized
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    else
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      token = request.headers['Authorization'].split.last

    19. 
            

            

                      decoded_token = decode_jwt_token(token)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      if decoded_token.nil?
          
      22.

      27.

                  def authenticate_with_email_and_password
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    user = User.find_for_authentication(email: auth_params[:email])
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    if user&.valid_password?(auth_params[:password])
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      # Recarregar user para garantir que temos a verso mais atual com user_profile
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      user.reload
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      user_profile = user.user_profile
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      token = update_user_token(user, user_profile)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      response_data = build_auth_response(token, user_profile)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        message: response_data[:message] || 'Login realizado com sucesso',
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        data: response_data
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    else
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        message: I18n.t('errors.messages.authentication.unauthorized'),
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        errors: [I18n.t('errors.messages.authentication.unauthorized')]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unauthorized
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57.

                  def update_user_token(user, user_profile)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    exp = Time.now.to_i + (24 * 3600)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    token_data = {
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      user_id: user.id,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      admin_id: user.id, # backward compatibility
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      exp: exp
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    if user_profile
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      token_data[:name] = user_profile.name
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      token_data[:last_name] = user_profile.last_name
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      token_data[:role] = user_profile.role
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    JWT.encode(token_data, Rails.application.secret_key_base)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  def auth_params
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    params.expect(auth: [:email, :password])
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77.

                  def decode_jwt_token(token)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    secret_key = Rails.application.secret_key_base
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    decoded_token = JWT.decode(token, secret_key)[0]
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess.new decoded_token
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  rescue JWT::DecodeError
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    # puts "Error decoding JWT token: #{e.message}"
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  def build_auth_response(token, user_profile)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    response = { token: token }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    # Pega o user do token decodificado
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    user_id = decode_jwt_token(token)['user_id'] || decode_jwt_token(token)['admin_id']
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    user = User.find(user_id)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    if user_profile.nil?
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      response[:needs_profile_completion] = true
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      response[:missing_fields] = required_profile_fields
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      response[:oab] = user.oab if user.oab.present?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      response[:message] = I18n.t('errors.messages.profile.incomplete')
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      incomplete_fields = check_profile_completeness(user_profile)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      if incomplete_fields.any?
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                        response[:needs_profile_completion] = true
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                        response[:missing_fields] = incomplete_fields
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                        response[:message] = I18n.t('errors.messages.profile.incomplete')
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      else
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                        response[:needs_profile_completion] = false
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                        response[:message] = 'Login realizado com sucesso'
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      response[:role] = user_profile.role
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      response[:name] = user_profile.name
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      response[:last_name] = user_profile.last_name
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      response[:oab] = user_profile.oab if user_profile.lawyer? && user_profile.oab.present?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      response[:gender] = user_profile.gender if user_profile.gender.present?
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    response
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  def check_profile_completeness(user_profile)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    missing_fields = []
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    # Campos obrigatrios bsicos
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :name if user_profile.name.blank?
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :last_name if user_profile.last_name.blank?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :cpf if user_profile.cpf.blank?
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :rg if user_profile.rg.blank?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :role if user_profile.role.blank?
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :gender if user_profile.gender.blank?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :civil_status if user_profile.civil_status.blank?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :nationality if user_profile.nationality.blank?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :birth if user_profile.birth.blank?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    # OAB obrigatrio apenas para advogados
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :oab if user_profile.lawyer? && user_profile.oab.blank?
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    # Verificar se tem pelo menos um telefone e email
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :phone if user_profile.phones.empty?
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    missing_fields << :address if user_profile.addresses.empty?
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    missing_fields
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  def required_profile_fields
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    [:name, :last_name, :cpf, :rg, :role, :gender, :civil_status, :nationality, :birth, :phone, :address]
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            end

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            class Api::V1::Customer::AuthController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include ErrorHandler
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              include JwtAuth
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7.

              def authenticate
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                if params[:provider] == 'google'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  authenticate_with_google

    10. 
            

            

                else

      14.

      15.

              def destroy
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                if request.headers['Authorization'].nil?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  render json: { success: false, message: 'Usurio no autorizado' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  token = request.headers['Authorization'].split.last
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  decoded_token = decode_jwt_token(token)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  if decoded_token.nil?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    render json: { success: false, message: 'Usurio no autorizado' }, status: :unauthorized
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  else
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    # Token is stateless now, so we just return success
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # The frontend will clear the token from local storage
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

      28.

              # GET /api/v1/customer/confirm?confirmation_token=abcde

              def confirm
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                customer = Customer.confirm_by_token(params[:confirmation_token])
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                if customer.errors.empty?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  token = update_user_token(customer)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  render json: { token: token, full_name: customer.profile_customer_full_name }
          
      39.

      43.

      44.

      45.

              def authenticate_with_email_and_password
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                customer = Customer.find_for_authentication(email: auth_params[:email])

    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73.

      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

      75.

              def authenticate_with_google
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                access_token = params[:accessToken]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return head :unauthorized if access_token.blank?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                user_info = fetch_google_user_info(access_token)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                return head :unauthorized if user_info.nil?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                email = user_info['email']
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                return head :unauthorized if email.blank?
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                customer = Customer.find_for_authentication(email: email)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                if customer
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  token = update_user_token(customer)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  render json: { token: token, full_name: customer.profile_customer_full_name }
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                else
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  head :not_found
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              def fetch_google_user_info(access_token)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                uri = URI('https://www.googleapis.com/oauth2/v3/tokeninfo')
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                params = { access_token: access_token }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                uri.query = URI.encode_www_form(params)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                response = Net::HTTP.get_response(uri)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                return nil unless response.is_a?(Net::HTTPSuccess)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error fetching Google user info: #{e.message}")
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                nil
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              def update_user_token(customer)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                exp = 24.hours.from_now.to_i
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                JWT.encode({ customer_id: customer.id, exp: exp }, Rails.application.secret_key_base)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              def auth_params
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                params.expect(auth: [:email, :password])
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

              end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              def decode_jwt_token(token)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                secret_key = Rails.application.secret_key_base
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                decoded_token = JWT.decode(token, secret_key)[0]
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess.new decoded_token
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              rescue JWT::DecodeError
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                # puts "Error decoding JWT token: #{e.message}"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                nil
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              def reset_password_params
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                params.expect(customer: [:email])
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              def update_password_params
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                params.expect(customer: [:password, :password_confirmation, :reset_password_token])
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            end
          
      142.

              # PATCH/PUT /api/v1/customer/profile_customers/1

              def update

                if params[:save_as_draft] == 'true'

                  save_draft_if_requested

    38.

    112.

      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        data: CustomerSerializer.new(@customer, include: [:profile_customer]).serializable_hash[:data]
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    else
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      error_messages = @customer.errors.full_messages
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  def destroy
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    if destroy_fully?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      customer = current_team.customers.with_deleted.find(params[:id])
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      customer.destroy_fully!
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      message = 'Cliente removido permanentemente'
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    else
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                      retrieve_customer
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      @customer.destroy
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      message = 'Cliente removido com sucesso'
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      message: message,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                      data: { id: params[:id] }
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  def restore
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    customer = current_team.customers.with_deleted.includes(
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      profile_customer: [
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                        :customer, :emails, :phones, :addresses, :bank_accounts,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        :customer_files, :represented_customers, :active_represents
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148.

      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    ).find(params[:id])
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    authorize customer, :restore?, policy_class: Admin::CustomerPolicy
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    if customer.recover
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      154.

                        success: true,
          
      155.

      156.

                  def handle_signed_pdf

    38. 
            

            

                    unless valid_pdf?(params[:file])

    46. 
            

            

                    if @document.save

      54.

                  def valid_pdf?(file)

                  def valid_docx?(file)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    file.content_type == 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document'
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  end
          
      87.

                  def attach_signed_file(file)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    @document.signed.purge if @document.signed.attached?

    90. 
            

            

                    S3UploadManager.upload_file(file, @document, :signed)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92.

                  def attach_source_file(file)

    96. 
            

            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.

    101.

            class Api::V1::Draft::WorksController < BackofficeController

              # GET /draft/works
          
      11.

              def index
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                @draft_works = Draft::Work.all
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                filter_by_deleted_params.each do |key, value|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  next if value.blank?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

                  @draft_works = @draft_works.public_send("filter_by_#{key}", value.strip)

    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19.

                render json: Draft::WorkSerializer.new(

              def authenticate_user_or_customer!

              def current_team

              def set_draftable

              def set_draft

              def authorize_draft!(draft)

    95. 
            

            

                authorized = if current_user

                               draft.user == current_user
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                             elsif current_customer
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                               draft.customer == current_customer
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                             else
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100.

    101. 
            

            

                             end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                return if authorized
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                render json: { error: 'Unauthorized' }, status: :forbidden
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

              def serialize_draft(draft)

    109.

      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  id: draft.id,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111.

    114.

      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  status: draft.status,
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  expires_at: draft.expires_at,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  created_at: draft.created_at,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  updated_at: draft.updated_at
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                }
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122.

              def serialize_drafts(drafts)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                drafts.map { |draft| serialize_draft(draft) }

    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            end

                  def index
