      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  before_action :retrieve_job, only: [:show, :update]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  before_action :perform_authorization, except: [:update]
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  after_action :verify_authorized
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  rescue_from ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound do |_exception|
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                      message: 'Job no encontrado',
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Job no encontrado']
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  rescue_from Pundit::NotAuthorizedError do |_exception|
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      message: 'Acesso no autorizado',
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Acesso no autorizado']
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    }, status: :unauthorized
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  def index
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    jobs = team_scoped(Job).all
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    filter_by_deleted_params.each do |key, value|
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      next if value.blank?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      jobs = jobs.public_send("filter_by_#{key}", value.strip)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    serialized_data = JobSerializer.new(
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      jobs,
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      meta: {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        total_count: jobs.offset(nil).limit(nil).count
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    ).serializable_hash
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      message: 'Jobs listados com sucesso',
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      data: serialized_data[:data],
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      meta: serialized_data[:meta]
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  def show
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      message: 'Job encontrado com sucesso',
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                      data: JobSerializer.new(
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        @job,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                        { params: { action: 'show' } }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      ).serializable_hash[:data]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  def create
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    job = Job.new(jobs_params)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    job.team = current_team
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    job.created_by = @current_user
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    if job.save
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      # Processar diferentes tipos de assignees aps salvar
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      assign_users_to_job(job, params[:job])
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        message: 'Job criado com sucesso',
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        data: JobSerializer.new(job).serializable_hash[:data]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      }, status: :created
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    else
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      render(
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                        status: :bad_request,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                        json: {
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                          success: false,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          message: job.errors.full_messages.first || 'Erro ao criar job',
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                          errors: job.errors.full_messages
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    render(
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      status: :bad_request,
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      json: {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        message: e.message || 'Erro ao processar requisio',
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        errors: [e.message]
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    )
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  def update
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    authorize @job, :update?, policy_class: Admin::WorkPolicy
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    if @job.update(jobs_params)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      # Atualizar assignees se fornecidos
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      assign_users_to_job(@job, params[:job], update: true)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                        message: 'Job atualizado com sucesso',
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                        data: JobSerializer.new(@job).serializable_hash[:data]
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    else
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      render(
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        status: :bad_request,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        json: {
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                          success: false,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                          message: @job.errors.full_messages.first || 'Erro ao atualizar job',
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                          errors: @job.errors.full_messages
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                        }
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      )
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  def destroy
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    if destroy_fully?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      job = team_scoped(Job).with_deleted.find(params[:id])
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      job.destroy_fully!
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                        message: 'Job excludo permanentemente com sucesso'
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    else
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      retrieve_job
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                      if @job.destroy
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                          success: true,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                          message: 'Job excludo com sucesso'
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                        }, status: :ok
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      else
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                          success: false,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                          message: 'Erro ao excluir job',
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                          errors: @job.errors.full_messages
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        }, status: :bad_request
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                      message: 'Job no encontrado',
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Job no encontrado']
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  def restore
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    job = team_scoped(Job).with_deleted.find(params[:id])
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    authorize job, :restore?, policy_class: Admin::WorkPolicy
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    if job.recover
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                        message: 'Job restaurado com sucesso',
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        data: JobSerializer.new(job).serializable_hash[:data]
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      render(
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                        status: :bad_request,
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                        json: {
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                          success: false,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                          message: job.errors.full_messages.first || 'Erro ao restaurar job',
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                          errors: job.errors.full_messages
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        }
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      )
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      message: 'Job no encontrado',
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Job no encontrado']
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  private
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  def retrieve_job
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    @job = team_scoped(Job).find(params[:id])
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  def jobs_params
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    params.expect(
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      job: [:description,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                            :deadline,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                            :status,
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                            :priority,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                            :comment,
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                            :profile_customer_id,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                            :work_id]
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    )
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  def perform_authorization
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    authorize [:admin, :job], :"#{action_name}?"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  def assign_users_to_job(job, job_params, update: false)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    # Se  update, remove assignees existentes apenas dos tipos que esto sendo atualizados
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    if update
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                      job.job_user_profiles.where(role: 'assignee').destroy_all if job_params[:assignee_ids].present?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                      job.job_user_profiles.where(role: 'supervisor').destroy_all if job_params[:supervisor_ids].present?
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                      job.job_user_profiles.where(role: 'collaborator').destroy_all if job_params[:collaborator_ids].present?
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    # Adicionar assignees (com validao de team)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    if job_params[:assignee_ids].present?
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      team_user_profiles = UserProfile.joins(:user).where(
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                        id: job_params[:assignee_ids],
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                        users: { team_id: job.team_id }
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      )
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      team_user_profiles.each do |user_profile|
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                        job.job_user_profiles.find_or_create_by(
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                          user_profile: user_profile,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                          role: 'assignee'
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                        )
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                      end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

            
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                      # Verificar se algum ID foi ignorado (no pertence ao team)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                      invalid_ids = job_params[:assignee_ids].map(&:to_i) - team_user_profiles.pluck(:id)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      if invalid_ids.any?
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn "UserProfile IDs #{invalid_ids} ignorados: no pertencem ao team #{job.team&.name}"
          
      228.

      229.

                    end
          
      230.

    231. 
            

            

                    # Adicionar supervisors (com validao de team)

                    if job_params[:supervisor_ids].present?
          
      233.

    234. 
            

            

                        id: job_params[:supervisor_ids],

    237.

                      team_user_profiles.each do |user_profile|

              def retrieve_law_area

                class LegalCostEntriesController < BackofficeController

                  def index

                  def create

                  # Custom endpoints
          
      62.

                  def mark_as_paid
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    @entry.mark_as_paid!(
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      payment_date: params[:payment_date] || Date.current,
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      receipt: params[:receipt_number],
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      method: params[:payment_method]
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    render json: LegalCostEntrySerializer.new(@entry), status: :ok
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  def mark_as_unpaid
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    @entry.mark_as_unpaid!
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    render json: LegalCostEntrySerializer.new(@entry), status: :ok
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  def batch_create
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    entries = []
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    errors = []
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    params[:entries].each do |entry_params|
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      entry = @legal_cost.entries.build(entry_params.permit(permitted_params))
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      if entry.save
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        entries << entry
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        errors << { entry: entry_params[:name], errors: entry.errors.full_messages }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    if errors.empty?
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      render json: LegalCostEntrySerializer.new(entries), status: :created
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                        created: entries.count,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        failed: errors.count,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        errors: errors
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    end
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  def by_type
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    entries_by_type = @legal_cost.entries.group(:cost_type).sum(:amount)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    formatted_data = entries_by_type.map do |type, amount|
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      {
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                        type: type,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                        display_name: LegalCostEntry::BRAZILIAN_COST_TYPES[type.to_sym],
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                        amount: amount,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                        count: @legal_cost.entries.where(cost_type: type).count
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      }
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    render json: { data: formatted_data }, status: :ok
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  private
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  def set_legal_cost
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    work = team_scoped(Work).find(params[:work_id])
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    if params[:procedure_id].present?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      procedure = work.procedures.find(params[:procedure_id])
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      honorary = procedure.honoraries.find(params[:honorary_id])
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    else
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      honorary = work.honoraries.find(params[:honorary_id])
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    @legal_cost = honorary.legal_cost
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    raise ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound unless @legal_cost
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  def set_entry
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    @entry = @legal_cost.entries.find(params[:id])
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  def entry_params
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    params.expect(entry: [permitted_params])
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139.

                  def permitted_params
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    [
          
      142.

                      :cost_type,

                      :name,

    144. 
            

            

                      :description,

      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      :estimated,
          
      147.

    151. 
            

            

                      :payment_method,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                      { metadata: {} }
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153.

      155.

    156. 
            

            

                  def apply_filters(entries)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    entries = entries.where(cost_type: params[:cost_type]) if params[:cost_type].present?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    entries = entries.where(paid: params[:paid] == 'true') if params[:paid].present?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    entries = entries.where(estimated: params[:estimated] == 'true') if params[:estimated].present?
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    entries = entries.overdue if params[:overdue] == 'true'
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    entries = entries.upcoming if params[:upcoming] == 'true'
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    entries
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  def perform_authorization
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    authorize LegalCostEntry
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            end

                  def summary

    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: 'No legal cost found' }, status: :not_found unless legal_cost

                  def overdue_entries

                  def upcoming_entries

                  def set_honorary

                  def set_legal_cost

                  def legal_cost_params
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    params.expect(
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      legal_cost: [:client_responsible,
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                                   :include_in_invoices,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                                   :admin_fee_percentage]
          
      113.
