                    @offices = OfficeFilter.retrieve_offices(current_team)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    filter_by_deleted_params.each do |key, value|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      next if value.blank?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      @offices = @offices.public_send("filter_by_#{key}", value.strip)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    serialized = OfficeSerializer.new(
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      @offices,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      meta: {
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                        total_count: @offices.offset(nil).limit(nil).count
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    ).serializable_hash
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      message: 'Escritrios listados com sucesso',
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      data: serialized[:data],
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      meta: serialized[:meta]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  def show
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    serialized = OfficeSerializer.new(
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      @office,
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      { params: { action: 'show' } }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    ).serializable_hash
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      message: 'Escritrio encontrado com sucesso',
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      data: serialized[:data]
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  def create
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    @office = current_team.offices.build(offices_params)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    @office.created_by = current_user if current_user
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    if @office.save
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                      serialized = OfficeSerializer.new(
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        @office,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        { params: { action: 'show' } }
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      ).serializable_hash
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        message: 'Escritrio criado com sucesso',
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        data: serialized[:data]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      }, status: :created
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      error_messages = @office.errors.full_messages
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Office creation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(10).join("\n") if e.backtrace
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    error_message = 'Erro ao criar escritrio. Tente novamente.'
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      message: error_message,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      errors: [error_message]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  def update
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    if @office.update(offices_params)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      serialized = OfficeSerializer.new(
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        @office,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        { params: { action: 'show' } }
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      ).serializable_hash
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                        message: 'Escritrio atualizado com sucesso',
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                        data: serialized[:data]
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    else
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      error_messages = @office.errors.full_messages
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  def destroy
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    if destroy_fully?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      office = current_team.offices.with_deleted.find(params[:id])
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      office.destroy_fully!
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      message = 'Escritrio removido permanentemente'
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    else
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      retrieve_office
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      @office.deleted_by = current_user if current_user
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      @office.destroy
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      message = 'Escritrio removido com sucesso'
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      message: message,
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      data: { id: params[:id] }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      message: 'Escritrio no encontrado',
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Escritrio no encontrado']
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  def with_lawyers
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    authorize [:admin, :office], :index?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    offices = OfficeFilter.retrieve_offices_with_lawyers(current_team)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    serialized = OfficeWithLawyersSerializer.new(offices).serializable_hash
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      message: 'Escritrios com advogados listados com sucesso',
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                      data: serialized[:data]
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  def restore
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    if @office.recover
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      serialized = OfficeSerializer.new(
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                        @office,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        { params: { action: 'show' } }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                      ).serializable_hash
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        message: 'Escritrio restaurado com sucesso',
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        data: serialized[:data]
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    else
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      error_messages = @office.errors.full_messages
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  # Attachment-specific actions
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  def upload_logo
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    retrieve_office
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    # Validate file type
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    unless params[:logo].content_type.in?(['image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'image/gif', 'image/webp'])
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                      return render json: {
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                        message: 'Formato de arquivo invlido. Use imagens JPEG, PNG, GIF ou WEBP'
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    metadata_params = {
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      document_date: params[:document_date],
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                      description: params[:description],
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                      custom_metadata: params[:custom_metadata],
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                      uploaded_by_id: current_user.id
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    @office.attach_logo_with_metadata(params[:logo], metadata_params)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    serialized = OfficeSerializer.new(
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      @office,
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                      { params: { action: 'show' } }
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    ).serializable_hash
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      message: 'Logo atualizado com sucesso',
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      data: serialized[:data]
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Logo upload failed: #{e.message}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                      message: 'Erro ao fazer upload do logo',
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      errors: [e.message]
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  def upload_contracts
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    retrieve_office
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    contracts = params[:contracts] || []
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    uploaded_contracts = []
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    contracts.each do |contract|
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                      # Validate file type (PDF and DOCX)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      unless contract.content_type.in?(['application/pdf', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document'])
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                        return render json: {
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                          success: false,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                          message: "Formato de arquivo invlido para #{contract.original_filename}. Use PDF ou DOCX"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                        }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                      end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      metadata_params = {
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                        document_date: params["document_date_#{contract.original_filename}"] || params[:document_date],
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                        description: params["description_#{contract.original_filename}"] || params[:description],
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                        custom_metadata: params["custom_metadata_#{contract.original_filename}"] || params[:custom_metadata],
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                        uploaded_by_id: current_user.id
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      }
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      @office.attach_social_contract_with_metadata(contract, metadata_params)
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                      uploaded_contracts << contract.original_filename
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231.

                    ).serializable_hash
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            
          
      237.

                    render json: {

                      success: true,

      241.

                  def perform_authorization

                  end

                  def index
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    # System powers (available to all) + custom powers from current team
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    powers = Power.system_powers.or(Power.where(created_by_team: @current_user.team))
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    render json: PowerSerializer.new(

    21. 
            

            

                      }

    22. 
            

            

                    ), status: :ok
          
      23.

                  end

                  def create

                    power = Power.new(powers_params)

    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    # Se no  um poder base e tem law_area_id, pode ser customizado
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    if !power.is_base? && power.law_area_id.present? && power.law_area&.system_area?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      # Se  uma rea do sistema, o poder pode ser customizado

    40.

    46. 
            

            

                        status: :bad_request,
          
      47.

                  def powers_params

                  def retrieve_power
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    # S permite acesso a poderes do sistema ou do prprio team
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    @power = Power.system_powers
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                               .or(Power.where(created_by_team: @current_user.team))
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                               .find(params[:id])
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      86.

                  def tree

                  def financial_summary

      88.

                  def apply_filters(procedures)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    procedures = procedures.where(procedure_type: params[:procedure_type]) if params[:procedure_type].present?
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    procedures = procedures.where(status: params[:status]) if params[:status].present?
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    procedures = procedures.where(system: params[:system]) if params[:system].present?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    procedures = procedures.where(competence: params[:competence]) if params[:competence].present?
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    procedures = procedures.with_priority if params[:priority] == 'true'
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    procedures
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  def build_tree(procedures)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    procedures.map do |procedure|
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      {
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                        id: procedure.id,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                        procedure_type: procedure.procedure_type,
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                        number: procedure.number,
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                        status: procedure.status,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                        children: build_tree(procedure.children)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      }
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  end
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  def perform_authorization
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    authorize Procedure
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            end

                  def restore

                    if profile_customer.recover
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        message: 'Perfil de cliente restaurado com sucesso',
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                        data: ProfileCustomerSerializer.new(
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                          profile_customer,
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                          params: { action: 'show' }
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                        ).serializable_hash[:data]
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    else
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      error_messages = profile_customer.errors.full_messages
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                    end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168.

                  private

                  def profile_customer
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    @profile_customer = ProfileCustomer.with_deleted.find(params[:id]) if truthy_param?(:include_deleted)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    @profile_customer ||= ProfileCustomerFilter.retrieve_customer(params[:id])
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  def profile_customers_params
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    params.require(:profile_customer).permit(
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      :customer_type, :name, :status, :customer_id, :last_name,
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      :cpf, :rg, :birth, :gender, :cnpj,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                      :civil_status, :nationality,
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                      :capacity, :profession,
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                      :company,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      :number_benefit,
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                      :nit, :mother_name,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      :inss_password,
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      :accountant_id,
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                      addresses_attributes: [:id, :description, :zip_code, :street, :number, :neighborhood, :city, :state],
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      bank_accounts_attributes: [:id, :bank_name, :type_account, :agency, :account, :operation, :pix],
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                      customer_attributes: [:id, :email, :access_email, :password, :password_confirmation],
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                      phones_attributes: [:id, :phone_number],
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                      emails_attributes: [:id, :email],
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                      represent_attributes: [:id, :representor_id],
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      customer_files_attributes: [:id, :file_description]
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    )
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    # rubocop:enable Rails/StrongParametersExpect
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  def perform_authorization
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    authorize [:admin, :work], :"#{action_name}?"
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            end
