                  class UserRegistrationController < ApplicationController
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    include ErrorHandler
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    def create
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                      ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                        # Primeiro criar o team
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                        team = create_team_for_user
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                        # Depois criar o user associado ao team
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                        user = User.new(user_params.merge(team: team))
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        # Usar save! para garantir rollback automtico se falhar
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                        user.save!
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                        # Se OAB foi fornecida, consultar API e criar UserProfile
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                        create_profile_from_oab(user) if user.oab.present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        # Recarregar user para pegar o user_profile que foi criado
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                        user.reload
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                          success: true,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                          message: 'User and team created successfully',
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                          data: build_response_data(user)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                        }, status: :created
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Validation error creating user: #{e.message}"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      error_messages = e.record.errors.full_messages
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first, # Single user-friendly message
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages # Array for detailed errors
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Error creating user and team: #{e.message}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      error_message = 'Erro interno do servidor. Tente novamente.'
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        message: error_message,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        errors: [error_message]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    private
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    def user_params
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      params.expect(user: [:email, :password, :password_confirmation, :oab])
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    def create_team_for_user
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      # Buscar dados do advogado se OAB foi fornecida
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      lawyer_name = nil
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      if params.dig(:user, :oab).present?
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                        lawyer_data = fetch_lawyer_data_from_oab(params[:user][:oab])
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        lawyer_name = build_full_name(lawyer_data) if lawyer_data
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      # Gerar subdomain baseado no nome do advogado ou email
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      subdomain = TeamSubdomainGenerator.generate(
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        name: lawyer_name,
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        email: params.dig(:user, :email)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      )
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      # Gerar nome do team
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      team_name = generate_team_name(lawyer_name, params.dig(:user, :email))
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      Team.create!(
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        name: team_name,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        subdomain: subdomain,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        settings: { auto_created: true }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      )
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    def fetch_lawyer_data_from_oab(oab_number)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      oab_service = OabApiService.new
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      oab_service.find_lawyer(oab_number)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn "Could not fetch OAB data for team creation: #{e.message}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      nil
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    def build_full_name(lawyer_data)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      return nil unless lawyer_data
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      "#{lawyer_data[:name]} #{lawyer_data[:last_name]}".strip.presence
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    def generate_team_name(lawyer_name, email)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      if lawyer_name.present?
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        "Escritrio #{lawyer_name}"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      elsif email.present?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        email_prefix = email.split('@').first.titleize
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                        "Escritrio #{email_prefix}"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      else
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                        'Meu Escritrio'
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    def create_profile_from_oab(user)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      oab_service = OabApiService.new
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      lawyer_data = oab_service.find_lawyer(user.oab)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info "OAB API returned data: #{lawyer_data.inspect}" if Rails.env.development?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      return unless lawyer_data
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        user_profile = user.create_user_profile!(
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                          name: lawyer_data[:name],
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                          last_name: lawyer_data[:last_name],
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                          oab: lawyer_data[:oab],
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                          role: 'lawyer',
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                          status: 'active',
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                          gender: lawyer_data[:gender]
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                          # Campos opcionais deixados em branco para serem preenchidos via modal
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                          # civil_status, cpf, nationality, rg, birth sero nil
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                        )
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info "Created UserProfile: #{user_profile.inspect}" if Rails.env.development?
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                        # Criar endereo se dados estiverem disponveis
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                        create_address_from_data(user_profile, lawyer_data) if has_address_data?(lawyer_data)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                        # Criar telefone se disponvel
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                        create_phone_from_data(user_profile, lawyer_data) if lawyer_data[:phone].present?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                        # Salvar URL da foto do perfil como atributo temporrio
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                        user_profile.update(origin: lawyer_data[:profile_picture_url]) if lawyer_data[:profile_picture_url]
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error "Error creating profile from OAB: #{e.message}"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      # No falha o cadastro se no conseguir criar o profile
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    def has_address_data?(lawyer_data)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      lawyer_data[:address].present? || lawyer_data[:city].present?
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    def create_address_from_data(user_profile, lawyer_data)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      # Create address directly through polymorphic association
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                      user_profile.addresses.create!(
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                        zip_code: lawyer_data[:zip_code],
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                        street: extract_street(lawyer_data[:address]),
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                        number: extract_number(lawyer_data[:address]),
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                        neighborhood: extract_neighborhood(lawyer_data[:address]),
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                        city: lawyer_data[:city],
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        state: lawyer_data[:state],
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                        address_type: 'main'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                      )
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    def create_phone_from_data(user_profile, lawyer_data)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      # Create phone directly through polymorphic association
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      user_profile.phones.create!(
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                        phone_number: lawyer_data[:phone]
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      )
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    def extract_street(address_str)
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                      return nil if address_str.blank?
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      # Exemplo: "RUA CARIMAS, N 288, SANTA CRUZ" -> "RUA CARIMAS"
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      parts = address_str.split(',')
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      parts.first&.strip
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    def extract_number(address_str)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      return nil if address_str.blank?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      # Procura por "N 288" ou similar
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      match = address_str.match(/[Nn]?\s*(\d+)/)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      match ? match[1].to_i : nil
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    def extract_neighborhood(address_str)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                      return nil if address_str.blank?
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                      # Exemplo: "RUA CARIMAS, N 288, SANTA CRUZ" -> "SANTA CRUZ"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                      parts = address_str.split(',')
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      return nil if parts.length < 3
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      parts.last&.strip
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    end
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    def build_response_data(user)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                      # Response simples para registro - lgica de completeness vai para o login
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      data = {
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                        id: user.id,
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                        email: user.email,
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                        oab: user.oab,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                        team: {
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                          id: user.team.id,
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                          name: user.team.name,
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                          subdomain: user.team.subdomain
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                        }
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      }
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      # Informar se UserProfile foi criado com dados da OAB
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                      if user.user_profile.present?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                        data[:profile_created] = true
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                        data[:profile] = {
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                          name: user.user_profile.name,
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                          last_name: user.user_profile.last_name,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                          role: user.user_profile.role
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                        }
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      else
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                        data[:profile_created] = false
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      data
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    end
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            end
          
      222.

                class RepresentsController < BackofficeController

                  # GET /api/v1/profile_customers/:profile_customer_id/represents

                  # GET /api/v1/represents (for all represents in the team)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  def index
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    represents = if @profile_customer
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                                   # Get represents for a specific customer
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                                   @profile_customer.represents
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                     .includes(:representor, :profile_customer)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                                     .by_team(current_team.id)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                                 else
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                                   # Get all represents for the current team
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                                   Represent.includes(:representor, :profile_customer)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                                     .by_team(current_team.id)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                                 end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    # Apply filters
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    represents = apply_filters(represents)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      message: 'Representaes listadas com sucesso',
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      data: represents.map { |r| serialize_represent(r) },
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      meta: {
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        total_count: represents.count
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38.

                  # GET /api/v1/represents/:id

                  def create
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    represent = Represent.new(represent_params)

    51.

    55.

      58.

      60.

      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63.

      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

                  # GET /api/v1/represents/by_representor/:representor_id

                  def by_representor
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                    representor_id = params[:representor_id]

                    represents = Represent.includes(:profile_customer)

                                   .active
          
      147.

      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    render json: {

    149.

      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      data: represents.map { |r| serialize_represent(r) }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  private
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  def set_represent
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    @represent = Represent.by_team(current_team.id).find(params[:id])
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      message: 'Representao no encontrada'
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  def set_profile_customer
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    return unless params[:profile_customer_id]
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                    @profile_customer = ProfileCustomer.joins(:customer)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                                          .joins(customer: :teams)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                                          .where(customers: { teams: { id: current_team.id } })
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                                          .find(params[:profile_customer_id])
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      message: 'Cliente no encontrado'
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  def represent_params
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    params.expect(
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                      represent: [:profile_customer_id,
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                                  :representor_id,

      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  def apply_filters(represents)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    # Filter by active status
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    if params[:active].present?
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      represents = params[:active] == 'true' ? represents.active : represents.inactive
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    # Filter by relationship type
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    if params[:relationship_type].present?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      represents = represents.where(relationship_type: params[:relationship_type])
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    # Filter by date range
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    represents = represents.current if params[:current].present? && params[:current] == 'true'
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    represents
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  def serialize_represent(represent, detailed: false)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    data = {
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      id: represent.id,
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                      profile_customer_id: represent.profile_customer_id,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                      profile_customer_name: represent.profile_customer&.full_name,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      profile_customer_cpf: represent.profile_customer&.cpf,
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      profile_customer_capacity: represent.profile_customer&.capacity,
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      representor_id: represent.representor_id,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      representor_name: represent.representor&.full_name,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                      representor_cpf: represent.representor&.cpf,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                      relationship_type: represent.relationship_type,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                      active: represent.active,
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      start_date: represent.start_date,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                      end_date: represent.end_date,
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      created_at: represent.created_at,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                      updated_at: represent.updated_at
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    }
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    if detailed
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      data.merge!(
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                        notes: represent.notes,
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                        team_id: represent.team_id,
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                        profile_customer: {
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                          id: represent.profile_customer&.id,
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                          name: represent.profile_customer&.full_name,
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                          cpf: represent.profile_customer&.cpf,
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                          capacity: represent.profile_customer&.capacity,
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                          birth: represent.profile_customer&.birth,
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                          email: represent.profile_customer&.customer&.email
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                        },
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                        representor: {
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                          id: represent.representor&.id,
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                          name: represent.representor&.full_name,
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                          cpf: represent.representor&.cpf,
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                          profession: represent.representor&.profession,
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                          email: represent.representor&.customer&.email,
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                          phone: represent.representor&.last_phone
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                        }
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                      )
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                    data
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                  end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  def perform_authorization
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                    authorize [:admin, :work], :"#{action_name}?"
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

              end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            end

                  def check_team_access!
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    # Usurios com role super_admin podem acessar qualquer team
          
      146.

                    return if @current_user&.user_profile&.super_admin?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    # Para update, verificar se  o prprio team e se tem role lawyer
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    if action_name == 'update'
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150.

    151. 
            

            

                      if @team != @current_user.team
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152.

      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154.

      155.

    156.

      157.

                        }, status: :forbidden
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                        nil

      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160.

      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      162.

      163.

      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                        nil

    167. 
            

            

                      end
          
      168.

      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      # Para show, qualquer usurio pode ver o prprio team
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      unless @team == @current_user.team
          
      171.

                  def create

    67.

      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    # If user_attributes are present but user_id is not, we're creating a new user
          
      70.

                    if profile_params[:user_attributes].present? && !profile_params[:user_id]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      user_attrs = profile_params[:user_attributes]

    72. 
            

            

                      user_attrs[:team_id] = current_team.id
          
      73.

    75.

    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84.

      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    end
