    119. 
            

            

                    }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  def update
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    if @user_profile.update(user_profiles_params)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      serialized_data = UserProfileSerializer.new(
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                        @user_profile,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                        params: { action: 'show' }
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      ).serializable_hash
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                        message: 'Perfil de usurio atualizado com sucesso',
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                        data: serialized_data[:data]
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      error_messages = @user_profile.errors.full_messages
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                      message: e.message,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                      errors: [e.message]
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  def destroy
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    if destroy_fully?
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                      user_profile = UserProfile.with_deleted.find(params[:id])
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      user_profile.destroy_fully!
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                      message = 'Perfil de usurio removido permanentemente'
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    else
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                      retrieve_user_profile
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                      @user_profile.destroy
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      message = 'Perfil de usurio removido com sucesso'
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                      success: true,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      message: message,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      data: { id: params[:id] }
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      message: 'Perfil de usurio no encontrado',
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Perfil de usurio no encontrado']
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    error_message = e.message
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                      message: error_message,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      errors: [error_message]
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  def restore
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    if @user_profile.recover
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      serialized_data = UserProfileSerializer.new(
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                        @user_profile,
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                        params: { action: 'show' }
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                      ).serializable_hash
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                        message: 'Perfil de usurio restaurado com sucesso',
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                        data: serialized_data[:data]
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                    else
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      error_messages = @user_profile.errors.full_messages
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                        message: error_messages.first,
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                        errors: error_messages
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      message: 'Perfil de usurio no encontrado',
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                      errors: ['Perfil de usurio no encontrado']
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    }, status: :not_found
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      message: e.message,
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      errors: [e.message]
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  def complete_profile
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    # Autorizar explicitamente para este mtodo
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    authorize :user_profile, :complete?
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

            
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    user = @current_user
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    user_profile = user.user_profile
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    # Se no existe user_profile, criar um novo
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    user_profile = user.build_user_profile if user_profile.nil?
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do # rubocop:disable Metrics/BlockLength
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      # Atualizar dados bsicos do profile
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                      basic_params = profile_completion_params.except(:phone, :addresses_attributes, :phones_attributes)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      user_profile.update!(basic_params) if basic_params.present?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                      # Lidar com telefone legacy (campo nico)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                      phone_number = params.dig(:user_profile, :phone)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                      create_or_update_phone(user_profile, phone_number) if phone_number.present?
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                      # Lidar com phones_attributes (nested)
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      phones_attrs = params.dig(:user_profile, :phones_attributes)
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                      if phones_attrs.present?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                        phones_attrs.each do |phone_attr|
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                          create_or_update_phone(user_profile, phone_attr[:phone_number])
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                        end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                      end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                      # Lidar com addresses_attributes (nested) - using polymorphic association
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                      addresses_attrs = params.dig(:user_profile, :addresses_attributes)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                      if addresses_attrs.present?
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                        addresses_attrs.each do |address_attr|
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                          user_profile.addresses.create!(
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                            street: address_attr[:street],
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                            number: address_attr[:number],
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                            neighborhood: address_attr[:neighborhood],
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                            city: address_attr[:city],
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                            state: address_attr[:state],
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                            zip_code: address_attr[:zip_code],
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                            complement: address_attr[:description],
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                            address_type: 'main'
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                          )
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                        end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                      end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                        message: 'Perfil completado com sucesso!',
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                        data: UserProfileSerializer.new(user_profile).serializable_hash
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                      }, status: :ok
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    error_messages = e.record.errors.full_messages
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                      message: error_messages.first,
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                      errors: error_messages
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error completing profile: #{e.message}"
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                      message: 'Erro interno do servidor',
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                      errors: [e.message]
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                    }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  private
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  def user_profiles_params
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                    params.require(:user_profile).permit(
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                      :role, :status, :user_id, :office_id, :name, :last_name, :gender, :oab,
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                      :rg, :cpf, :nationality, :civil_status, :birth, :mother_name, :origin,
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                      user_attributes: [:id, :email, :access_email, :password, :password_confirmation],
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                      office_attributes: [:name, :cnpj],
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                      addresses_attributes: [:id, :description, :zip_code, :street, :number, :neighborhood, :city,
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                                             :state, :complement, :address_type],
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                      bank_accounts_attributes: [:id, :bank_name, :type_account, :agency, :account, :operation, :pix],
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                      phones_attributes: [:id, :phone_number]
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                    )
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                    # rubocop:enable Rails/StrongParametersExpect
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  end
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

            
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  def retrieve_user_profile
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                    # Super admin pode acessar qualquer perfil
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                    @user_profile = if super_admin_access?
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                                      UserProfile.find(params[:id])
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                                    else
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                                      UserProfile.joins(:user).where(users: { team: current_team }).find(params[:id])
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                  end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  def retrieve_deleted_user_profile
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                    # Super admin pode acessar qualquer perfil deletado
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                    @user_profile = if super_admin_access?
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                                      UserProfile.with_deleted.find(params[:id])
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                                    else
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                                      UserProfile.with_deleted.joins(:user).where(users: { team: current_team }).find(params[:id])
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                                    end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                  end
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

            
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  def profile_completion_params
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                    params.expect(user_profile: [:name, :last_name, :role, :oab, :cpf, :rg, :gender, :civil_status,
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                                                 :nationality, :birth, :phone,
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                                                 { addresses_attributes: [:description, :zip_code, :street, :number,
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                                                                          :neighborhood, :city, :state],
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                                                   phones_attributes: [:phone_number] }])
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                  end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                  def create_or_update_phone(user_profile, phone_number)
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                    # Limpa o telefone (remove formatao)
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                    clean_phone = phone_number.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

            
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                    # Verifica se j existe um telefone (usando polymorphic association)
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                    existing_phone = user_profile.phones.first
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

            
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                    if existing_phone
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                      # Atualiza o telefone existente
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                      existing_phone.update!(phone_number: clean_phone)
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                    else
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                      # Cria novo telefone diretamente pela associao polimrfica
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                      user_profile.phones.create!(
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                        phone_number: clean_phone
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                      )
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                    end
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                  end
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

            
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                  def perform_authorization
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                    # Skip authorization for complete_profile since it has explicit authorization
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                    return if action_name == 'complete_profile'
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

            
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                    authorize [:admin, :work], :"#{action_name}?"
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                  end
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                end
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

              end
          
      349.

            end

                  def destroy

                  def create

                    work_attributes = work_params

    58. 
            

            

                    if work.save

    59. 
            

            

                      Works::CreateDocumentService.call(work)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      # Reload to get all associations

    62. 
            

            

                      work.reload
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      # Get the serialized data without the outer "data" wrapper
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      serialized = WorkSerializer.new(work).serializable_hash
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        success: true,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        message: 'Work created successfully',
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        data: serialized[:data] # Extract just the data part, not the wrapper
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      }, status: :created
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        success: false,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        message: work.errors.full_messages.first || 'Failed to create work',
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        errors: work.errors.full_messages
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    end

                  rescue StandardError => e

    81. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82.

      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      errors: [e.message]
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    }, status: :bad_request

    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87.

                  def update

    88. 
            

            

                    authorize @work, :update?, policy_class: Admin::WorkPolicy

    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90.

      107.

                  def destroy

    112. 
            

            

                    if destroy_fully?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113.

                  def convert_documents_to_pdf

                class ZapsignController < BackofficeController
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  before_action :set_work, only: [:create]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  before_action :set_documents, only: [:create]
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  before_action :initialize_zapsign_service
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  before_action :authenticate_admin, only: [:create]
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  before_action :secret_key_access, only: [:webhook]
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  def create
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    valid_documents, invalid_documents = validate_documents(@documents)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    results = valid_documents.map do |document|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      result = @zapsign_service.create_document(document)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      document.update!(status: :pending_external_signature)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      { document_id: document.id, status: :success, response: result }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      { document_id: document.id, status: :error, error: e.message }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    render json: {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      success: results.select { |r| r[:status] == :success },
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      errors: results.select { |r| r[:status] == :error } + invalid_documents
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    }, status: :ok
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  def webhook
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    payload = JSON.parse(request.body.read, symbolize_names: true)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    document = Document.find_by(id: payload[:external_id])
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    if document
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      response = @zapsign_service.receive_signed_doc(document, payload)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      render json: response, status: :ok
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      render json: { error: 'Documento no encontrado.' }, status: :not_found
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  private
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  def set_work
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    @work = Work.find(params[:work_id])
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: 'Work no encontrado' }, status: :not_found
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50.

                  def set_documents
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    @documents = @work.documents
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  def initialize_zapsign_service
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    @zapsign_service = ZapsignService.new
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  def validate_documents(documents)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    valid_documents = []
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    invalid_documents = []
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    documents.each do |document|
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      if document.format == 'pdf' && document.status == 'approved'
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                        valid_documents << document
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      else
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        invalid_documents << {
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                          document_id: document.id,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                          status: :error,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          error: 'Documento no atende aos requisitos: format=pdf, status=approved, sign_source=no_signature'
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    [valid_documents, invalid_documents]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            end
          
      80.

    app/controllers/application_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            class ApplicationController < ActionController::API
          
      4.

              def truthy_param?(key)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                ActiveModel::Type::Boolean.new.cast(params[key])
          
      11.

            module ErrorHandler

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern

              included do
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                rescue_from StandardError, with: :handle_standard_error
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                rescue_from ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, with: :handle_not_found

    9. 
            

            

                rescue_from ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid, with: :handle_record_invalid

                rescue_from ActiveRecord::RecordNotDestroyed, with: :handle_not_destroyed

              def handle_not_found(exception)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                log_error(exception)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # When it's a User not found by team scoping,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # it's actually an authorization issue, not a missing resource
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                if exception.model == 'User'
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  message = I18n.t('errors.messages.general.unauthorized_access', default: 'Unauthorized access')
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  render_error(message, :forbidden)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  model_name = exception.model || 'Record'
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  message = "#{model_name} not found"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  render_error(message, :not_found)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33.

              def handle_record_invalid(exception)

    52. 
            

            

                                                             default: 'You are not authorized to perform this action')

              def handle_jwt_expired(exception)

              def handle_standard_error(exception)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                log_error(exception)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                # In development/test, show the actual error
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                if Rails.env.local?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  render_error(exception.message, :internal_server_error)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # In production, show a generic message
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

      75.

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77.

              def render_error(message, status)

    79. 
            

            

                render json: {

    80.

      83.

      84.

              end
          
      87.

              def log_error(exception)

      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92.

                # You can add external error tracking here later

            module JwtAuth

              def authenticate_user
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Support both new user_id and legacy admin_id for backward compatibility
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                user_id = payload['user_id'] || payload['admin_id']
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                head :unauthorized and return unless user_id
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @current_user ||= User.find(user_id)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                head :unauthorized unless valid_token?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              rescue JWT::DecodeError
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                head :unauthorized
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              # Legacy method for backward compatibility

              alias authenticate_admin authenticate_user

              def authenticate_customer
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                head :unauthorized and return unless payload.key?('customer_id')
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                @current_customer ||= Customer.find(payload['customer_id'])
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                head :unauthorized unless valid_token?
          
      23.

              rescue JWT::DecodeError
          
      24.

                head :unauthorized

              def token
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                @token ||= request.headers['Authorization']&.split&.last
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              def decode_token
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                JWT.decode(token, Rails.application.secret_key_base, true, algorithm: 'HS256')[0]
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              def payload
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                @payload ||= decode_token
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def valid_token?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                Time.now.to_i < payload['exp']
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              rescue JWT::DecodeError
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                false
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            end

              def render_success(message: nil, data: nil, status: :ok)

              def render_created(resource, serializer_class = nil)

              def set_current_team

              def current_team

    17. 
            

            

                @current_team

              def detect_team_from_request
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # Priority order: header, subdomain, user's team
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                team_from_header || team_from_subdomain || current_user_team
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              def team_from_header
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                team_id = request.headers['X-Team-Id']
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                return nil if team_id.blank?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # SEGURANA: Validar se o usurio tem acesso ao team solicitado
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                requested_team = Team.find_by(id: team_id)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                return nil unless requested_team
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Permitir apenas se for o team do usurio atual
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                if @current_user.present? && @current_user.respond_to?(:team) && (requested_team == @current_user.team)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  return requested_team
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                nil
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def team_from_subdomain
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                subdomain = request.subdomain
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                return nil if subdomain.blank?
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # SEGURANA: Validar se o usurio tem acesso ao team do subdomain
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                requested_team = Team.find_by(subdomain: subdomain)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                return nil unless requested_team
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Permitir apenas se for o team do usurio atual
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                if @current_user.present? && @current_user.respond_to?(:team) && (requested_team == @current_user.team)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  return requested_team
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                nil

              end

              def current_user_team

                return if @current_user.blank?

              def ensure_team_access

              def team_scoped(model)

                # Super admin tem acesso total ao sistema, sem limitao de team

              def ensure_belongs_to_current_team(record)

              def super_admin_access?

                # Verifica se o usurio atual tem role de super_admin

      99.

                  @current_user.user_profile&.role == 'super_admin'
          
      100.

              def unauthorized(exception)

            class AgeTransitionCheckerJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def perform
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                check_age_transitions
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              end
          
      9.
