              private
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def check_age_transitions
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Find all customers whose capacity might need updating based on age
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                ProfileCustomer.includes(:customer).find_each do |profile|
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  next if profile.birth.blank?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  next if profile.deceased_at.present?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  current_age = calculate_age(profile.birth)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  expected_capacity = determine_capacity_by_age(current_age)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Skip if capacity is already correct or if manually overridden
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  next if profile.capacity == expected_capacity
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Check if this is an automatic age-based transition
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  if should_transition?(profile, current_age, expected_capacity)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    handle_age_transition(profile, current_age, expected_capacity)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def calculate_age(birth_date)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                today = Date.current
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                age = today.year - birth_date.year
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                age -= 1 if today < birth_date + age.years
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                age
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              def determine_capacity_by_age(age)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                case age
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                when 0..15
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  'unable'
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                when 16..17
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  'relatively'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                else
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  'able'
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def should_transition?(profile, age, _expected_capacity)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Only transition if it's a birthday-triggered change
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                today = Date.current
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                birth_date = profile.birth
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # Check if today is the birthday that triggers a transition
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                is_16th_birthday = age == 16 && birth_date.month == today.month && birth_date.day == today.day
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                is_18th_birthday = age == 18 && birth_date.month == today.month && birth_date.day == today.day
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # Transition if it's a significant birthday
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                return true if is_16th_birthday && profile.capacity == 'unable'
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                return true if is_18th_birthday && profile.capacity == 'relatively'
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                false
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def handle_age_transition(profile, age, new_capacity)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                old_capacity = profile.capacity
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                # Update capacity without triggering PaperTrail (automatic change)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                profile.paper_trail.without_versioning do
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  profile.update!(capacity: new_capacity)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # Create compliance notification
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                create_compliance_notification(profile, old_capacity, new_capacity, age)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Age transition: ProfileCustomer ##{profile.id} changed from #{old_capacity} to #{new_capacity} (age: #{age})"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              def create_compliance_notification(profile, old_capacity, new_capacity, age)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                title = case new_capacity
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                        when 'relatively'
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                          'Minor transitioned to relatively incapable'
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                        when 'able'
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                          'Minor became an adult'
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                        else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                          'Capacity change due to age'
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                description = "#{profile.full_name} (CPF: #{profile.cpf}) has turned #{age} years old today. " \
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                              "Their capacity has automatically changed from '#{old_capacity}' to '#{new_capacity}'. " \
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                              'Please review and update any necessary documents.'
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                # Get team from customer's teams (using first team if multiple)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                team = profile.customer&.teams&.first
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                return unless team # Skip if no team associated
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                ComplianceNotification.create!(
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  notification_type: 'age_transition',
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  title: title,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  description: description,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  status: 'pending',
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  team: team,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  resource_type: 'ProfileCustomer',
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  resource_id: profile.id,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  metadata: {
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    old_capacity: old_capacity,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    new_capacity: new_capacity,
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    age: age,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    transition_date: Date.current.to_s
          
      110.

                  }
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                )
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113.

            end

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      5.

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      8.

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      9.

            class MailDeliveryJob < ApplicationJob

      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Retry failed jobs with exponential backoff
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              retry_on StandardError, wait: :exponentially_longer, attempts: 3
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Discard jobs that fail due to record not found (e.g., deleted records)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              discard_on ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def perform(mail_service_class, *args)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # Call the mail service with the provided arguments
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                mail_service_class.constantize.call(*args)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "[MailDeliveryJob] Failed to deliver email: #{e.message}"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(5).join("\n")
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                raise # Re-raise to trigger retry
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            end
          
      21.

              def full_address

              def formatted_zip_code

              def google_maps_url

              def same_city_as?(other_address)

                return false unless other_address.is_a?(Address)

                city.downcase == other_address.city.downcase && 
          
      94.

                state.upcase == other_address.state.upcase

            module CnpjValidatable

              extend ActiveSupport::Concern

                validates :cnpj, presence: true, uniqueness: true

              # Instance methods available to including classes

    14. 
            
              1
            

            

              def formatted_cnpj
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                return nil unless cnpj.present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                clean = cnpj.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                return cnpj if clean.length != 14
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                "#{clean[0..1]}.#{clean[2..4]}.#{clean[5..7]}/#{clean[8..11]}-#{clean[12..13]}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
              1
            

            

              def cnpj_digits_only
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                cnpj&.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
              1
            

            

              def normalize_cnpj
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                self.cnpj = cnpj.gsub(/\D/, '') if cnpj.present?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
              1
            

            

              def cnpj_format_valid
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                return if cnpj.blank?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                clean_cnpj = cnpj.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Check basic format
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                unless clean_cnpj.match?(/\A\d{14}\z/)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:cnpj, "must have exactly 14 digits")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  return
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Check for invalid patterns (all same digits)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                if clean_cnpj.chars.uniq.length == 1
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:cnpj, "cannot have all identical digits")
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  return
          
      47.

      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Validate checksum

    50. 
            

            

                unless valid_cnpj_checksum?(clean_cnpj)
          
      51.

                  errors.add(:cnpj, "has invalid checksum")
          
      52.

              def valid_cnpj_checksum?(cnpj)

    56. 
            

            

                return false if cnpj.length != 14
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                digits = cnpj.chars.map(&:to_i)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # First check digit calculation
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                sum = 0
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                weights = [5, 4, 3, 2, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                12.times do |i|

      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                remainder = sum % 11
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                first_check = remainder < 2 ? 0 : 11 - remainder
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                return false if digits[12] != first_check
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Second check digit calculation
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                sum = 0
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                weights = [6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76.

      77.

                  sum += digits[i] * weights[i]

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                remainder = sum % 11

                def find_by_cnpj(cnpj_input)

    90.

              def document_name_parsed

              end

              private
          
      86.

              def sign_source_restriction
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                return unless will_save_change_to_sign_source?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                if status.to_sym == :signed
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  unless sign_source.in?([
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                                           'manual_signature', 'zapsign'
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                                         ])
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:sign_source,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                               'deve ser "manual_signature" ou "zapsign" quando o status for "signed"')
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                else
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  unless sign_source == 'no_signature'
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    errors.add(:sign_source,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                               'deve ser "no_signature" quando o status no for "signed"')
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              end
          
      104.

            end

            class Draft < ApplicationRecord
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              belongs_to :draftable, polymorphic: true
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              belongs_to :user, optional: true
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              belongs_to :customer, optional: true
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              belongs_to :team, optional: true
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              enum :status, {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                draft: 'draft',
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                recovered: 'recovered',
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                expired: 'expired'
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              validates :form_type, presence: true
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              validates :data, presence: true
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              scope :active, -> { where(status: 'draft').where('expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > ?', Time.current) }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              scope :expired, -> { where(expires_at: ...Time.current) }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              before_validation :set_default_expiration
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              def self.save_draft(draftable:, form_type:, data:, user: nil, customer: nil, team: nil)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # Determine team from user or customer if not provided
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                team ||= determine_team(user, customer)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                draft = find_or_initialize_by(
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  draftable: draftable,
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  form_type: form_type,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  team: team
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                )
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                draft.update!(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  data: data,
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  user: user,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  customer: customer,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  status: 'draft',
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  expires_at: 30.days.from_now
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                )
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                draft
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              def self.determine_team(user, customer)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                if user.respond_to?(:team)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  user.team
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                elsif customer
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  # Get team from customer's team_customer association
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  TeamCustomer.find_by(customer: customer)&.team
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                else
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  Team.find_by(name: 'Default') # Fallback to default team if exists
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              def recover!
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                update!(status: 'recovered')
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

              def expired?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                expires_at.present? && expires_at < Time.current
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              def mark_expired!
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                update!(status: 'expired')
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              private
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              def set_default_expiration
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                self.expires_at ||= 30.days.from_now
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            end
          
      106.

            class OfficeFilter

              class << self
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def retrieve_office(id, team)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  team.offices.find(id)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9.

                def retrieve_offices(team)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  team.offices.includes(:phones, :addresses, :office_emails, :office_bank_accounts)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                end
          
      12.

                def retrieve_offices_with_lawyers(team)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # Get all offices that have users with OAB (lawyers) for current team
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  team.offices
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    .joins(:users)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    .includes(:users, :user_offices)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    .where.not(users: { oab: [nil, ''] })
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    .distinct
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22.

            end

            class PowerFilter

                def by_cat(category)

                end

            class Honorary < ApplicationRecord

              acts_as_paranoid

              def total_estimated_value

                components.active.sum { |c| c.calculate_total || 0 }

              end
          
      102.

              def is_global?

                work.present? && procedure.blank?

    105. 
            

            

              end

              def is_procedure_specific?

      110.

      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def parent_work

    112. 
            

            

                procedure.present? ? procedure.work : work
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              private
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              def attached_to_work_or_procedure
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                errors.add(:base, 'Honorary must be attached to either a Work or a Procedure') if work.blank? && procedure.blank?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                return unless procedure.present? && work.present? && procedure.work != work
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                errors.add(:base, 'Procedure must belong to the same Work')
          
      123.

            class HonoraryComponent < ApplicationRecord
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              belongs_to :honorary
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              COMPONENT_TYPES = [
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                'fixed_fee',
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                'hourly_rate',
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                'monthly_retainer',
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                'success_fee',
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                'performance_fee',
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                'consultation_fee',
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                'previdenciario_fee', # Social security specific
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                'sucumbencia_fee' # Brazilian loser-pays fee
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              ].freeze
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              validates :component_type, presence: true, inclusion: { in: COMPONENT_TYPES }
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              validates :details, presence: true
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # Scopes
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              scope :active, -> { where(active: true) }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              COMPONENT_TYPES.each do |type|
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                scope type.to_sym, -> { where(component_type: type) }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              # JSON Schema validations
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              validate :validate_schema
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def validate_schema
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                case component_type
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                when 'fixed_fee'
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  validate_fixed_fee_schema
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                when 'hourly_rate'
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  validate_hourly_rate_schema
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                when 'monthly_retainer'
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  validate_monthly_retainer_schema
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                when 'success_fee'
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  validate_success_fee_schema
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                when 'performance_fee'
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  validate_performance_fee_schema
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                when 'consultation_fee'
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  validate_consultation_fee_schema
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                when 'previdenciario_fee'
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  validate_previdenciario_fee_schema
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                when 'sucumbencia_fee'
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  validate_sucumbencia_fee_schema
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              # Calculation methods
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              def calculate_total
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                case component_type
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                when 'fixed_fee'
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  details['amount']
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                when 'hourly_rate'
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  (details['rate'] || 0) * (details['estimated_hours'] || 0)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                when 'monthly_retainer'
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  (details['monthly_amount'] || 0) * (details['months'] || 1)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                when 'previdenciario_fee'
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  calculate_previdenciario_total
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  nil # Some fees can't be calculated upfront
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def display_name
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                I18n.t("honorary_components.types.#{component_type}", default: component_type.humanize)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              def formatted_details
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                case component_type
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                when 'fixed_fee'
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  format_fixed_fee
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                when 'hourly_rate'
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  format_hourly_rate
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                when 'monthly_retainer'
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  format_monthly_retainer
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                when 'success_fee'
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  format_success_fee
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                when 'previdenciario_fee'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  format_previdenciario_fee
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                else
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  details
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              private
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              def calculate_previdenciario_total
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                base_income = details['monthly_income_average'] || 0
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                months = details['benefit_months'] || 0
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                percentage = details['percentage'] || 20
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                (base_income * months * percentage / 100.0)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def format_fixed_fee
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                {
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  amount: format_currency(details['amount']),
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  installments: details['installments'],
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  payment_terms: details['payment_terms']
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                }
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              def format_hourly_rate
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                {
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  rate: format_currency(details['rate']),
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  estimated_hours: details['estimated_hours'],
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  total: format_currency(calculate_total)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              def format_monthly_retainer
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                {
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  monthly_amount: format_currency(details['monthly_amount']),
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  months: details['months'],
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  total: format_currency(calculate_total)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145.

              def format_success_fee
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                {
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  percentage: "#{details['percentage']}%",
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  minimum: format_currency(details['minimum_amount']),
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  maximum: format_currency(details['maximum_amount'])
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              def format_previdenciario_fee
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                {
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  percentage: "#{details['percentage']}%",
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  monthly_income: format_currency(details['monthly_income_average']),
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  months: details['benefit_months'],
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  estimated_total: format_currency(calculate_total)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                }

    161. 
            

            

              end
          
      162.

              def format_currency(value)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                return nil unless value
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                ActionController::Base.helpers.number_to_currency(value, unit: 'R$', separator: ',', delimiter: '.')
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168.

              def validate_fixed_fee_schema
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                required_fields = ['amount']
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                validate_required_fields(required_fields)
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                validate_numeric_field('amount')
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                validate_numeric_field('installments', required: false)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

              end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175.

              def validate_hourly_rate_schema

                validate_required_fields(required_fields)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                validate_numeric_field('rate')
          
      180.

                validate_numeric_field('estimated_hours', required: false)
          
      181.

                validate_numeric_field('minimum_hours', required: false)
          
      182.

              def validate_performance_fee_schema
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                validate_array_field('milestones', required: false)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              def validate_required_fields(fields)
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                fields.each do |field|
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:details, "#{field} is required") if details[field].blank?
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              def validate_numeric_field(field, required: true)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                return unless required || details[field].present?
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                value = details[field]
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                return unless value.present? && !value.is_a?(Numeric)
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                errors.add(:details, "#{field} must be a number")
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              def validate_array_field(field, required: true)
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                return unless required || details[field].present?
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                value = details[field]
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                return unless value.present? && !value.is_a?(Array)
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                errors.add(:details, "#{field} must be an array")
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

              end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            end
          
      245.

            class Job < ApplicationRecord
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              include DeletedFilterConcern
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              acts_as_paranoid
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              belongs_to :team
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              belongs_to :work, optional: true
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              belongs_to :profile_customer, optional: true
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              belongs_to :created_by, class_name: 'User'
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              has_many :job_user_profiles, dependent: :destroy

              def add_assignee(user_profile, role: 'assignee')
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Validar se o user_profile pertence ao mesmo team
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                unless user_profile&.user&.team == team
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "UserProfile deve pertencer ao mesmo team do job (#{team&.name})"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                job_user_profiles.find_or_create_by(user_profile: user_profile, role: role)
          
      82.

      83.

      87.

              def user_involved?(user_or_user_profile)

    89. 
            

            

                user_profile = user_or_user_profile.is_a?(User) ? user_or_user_profile.user_profile : user_or_user_profile
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90.

              def check_and_update_status
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                return unless status == 'pending'
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                return unless deadline < Time.zone.today
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                self.status = 'delayed'
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                save!
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140.

      141.

              def work_same_team
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                errors.add(:work, 'deve ser do mesmo team') unless work.team == team
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145.

      146.

              def customer_same_team
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                customer_teams = profile_customer.customer.teams
          
      148.

      150.

              def at_least_one_assignee
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                # S valida se o job j foi persistido (after_create j rodou)

    153.

      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                errors.add(:base, 'Job deve ter pelo menos um responsvel (assignee)') if assignees.empty?
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156.

      157.

              def ensure_creator_as_assignee
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # Se no tem nenhum assignee, adiciona o criador como assignee
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                return unless assignees.empty? && created_by&.user_profile.present?
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                add_assignee(created_by.user_profile, role: 'assignee')
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            end
