            class LawArea < ApplicationRecord
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # Relacionamento hierrquico
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              belongs_to :parent_area, class_name: 'LawArea', optional: true
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              has_many :sub_areas, class_name: 'LawArea', foreign_key: 'parent_area_id', dependent: :destroy,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                                   inverse_of: :parent_area
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # Relacionamento com team e powers
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              belongs_to :created_by_team, class_name: 'Team', optional: true
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              has_many :powers, dependent: :restrict_with_error
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              # Validaes

    41. 
            

            

              validates :name, presence: true
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

              validate :cannot_be_parent_of_itself

    47. 
            

            

              scope :main_areas, -> { where(parent_area_id: nil) }

    48.

    49.

    50. 
            

            

              scope :custom_areas, -> { where.not(created_by_team_id: nil) }

    51.

              def main_area?

    55. 
            

            

                parent_area_id.nil?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57.

              def hierarchy_path
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                return [self] if main_area?

    78.

      81.

              def depth

    83. 
            

            

                return 0 if main_area?

    85. 
            

            

                parent_area.depth + 1
          
      86.

      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              # Busca todas as subreas recursivamente
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              def all_sub_areas
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                sub_areas.includes(:sub_areas).flat_map { |sub| [sub] + sub.all_sub_areas }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

              # Busca todos os poderes aplicveis (prprios + herdados)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              def applicable_powers
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                if main_area?
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  powers
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                else
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  # Poderes especficos da subrea + poderes da rea pai que no tm verso especfica
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  specific_powers = powers
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  parent_descriptions = specific_powers.pluck(:description, :category)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  inherited_powers = parent_area.powers.where.not(
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    [:description, :category] => parent_descriptions
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  )
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  Power.where(id: (specific_powers + inherited_powers).map(&:id))
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              private
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              def cannot_be_parent_of_itself
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                return unless parent_area_id
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                if id == parent_area_id
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:parent_area, 'no pode ser a prpria rea')
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                elsif parent_area&.hierarchy_path&.include?(self)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:parent_area, 'criaria uma referncia circular')
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            end

            class LegalCost < ApplicationRecord
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              belongs_to :honorary
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              has_many :entries, class_name: 'LegalCostEntry', dependent: :destroy

    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # Validations

              validates :admin_fee_percentage, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0, less_than_or_equal_to: 100 }, allow_nil: true

    29.

              def total_amount

              def overdue_entries
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

              end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

    60. 
            

            

              def upcoming_entries(days = 30)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                entries.where(paid: false)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  .where(due_date: Date.current..(Date.current + days.days))
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def total_with_admin_fee
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                return total_amount if admin_fee_percentage.zero?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                total_amount * (1 + (admin_fee_percentage / 100.0))
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              def admin_fee_amount
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                return 0 if admin_fee_percentage.zero?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                total_amount * (admin_fee_percentage / 100.0)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76.

              def summary

                  total: total_amount,

              # Scopes
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              scope :paid, -> { where(paid: true) }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              scope :pending, -> { where(paid: false) }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              scope :overdue, -> { pending.where(due_date: ...Date.current) }
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              scope :upcoming, ->(days = 30) { pending.where('due_date BETWEEN ? AND ?', Date.current, Date.current + days.days) }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              scope :estimated, -> { where(estimated: true) }
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              scope :confirmed, -> { where(estimated: false) }
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              scope :by_type, ->(type) { where(cost_type: type) }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77.

              def overdue?
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                !paid? && due_date.present? && due_date < Date.current
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              def upcoming?(days = 30)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                !paid? && due_date.present? && due_date.between?(Date.current, Date.current + days.days)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              def days_until_due
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                return nil if due_date.blank?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                (due_date - Date.current).to_i
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              end
          
      114.

              def days_overdue

              end
          
      120.

              def display_name
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                BRAZILIAN_COST_TYPES[cost_type.to_sym] || name

              end

    124. 
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              def status
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                if paid?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  'paid'
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                elsif overdue?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  'overdue'
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                elsif upcoming?(7)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  'urgent'
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                elsif upcoming?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  'upcoming'
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                else
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  'pending'
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              def status_color
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                case status
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                when 'paid' then 'green'
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                when 'overdue' then 'red'
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                when 'urgent' then 'orange'
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                when 'upcoming' then 'yellow'
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                else 'gray'
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149.

              def set_defaults
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                self.estimated = false if estimated.nil?
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                self.paid = false if paid.nil?
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            end

              def total_quotes_value

                return 0.0 unless quote_value.present? && number_of_quotes.present?

              # Get social contracts with metadata

              def social_contracts_with_metadata
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                return [] unless social_contracts.attached?
          
      128.

      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129.

      130.

      131.

      132.

                  {
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    id: contract.id,

      135.

      137.

      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    created_at: contract.created_at,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139.

      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    download_url: Rails.application.routes.url_helpers.rails_blob_url(contract, disposition: 'attachment', only_path: true),
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    # Metadata fields
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142.

              def attach_social_contract_with_metadata(file, metadata_params = {})

                contract = social_contracts.attach(file)

                if contract && metadata_params.present?
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156.

      157.

      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158.

      159.

      164.

      165.

                contract

              # Attach logo with metadata

              def attach_logo_with_metadata(file, metadata_params = {})
          
      170.

              private
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
              1
            

            

              def unipessoal_must_have_only_one_partner
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                return unless user_offices.where(partnership_type: 'socio').many?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                errors.add(:society, 'unipessoal deve ter apenas um scio')
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
              1
            

            

              def partnership_percentage_sum_to_100
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                # Skip validation if no partners yet or if it's a new record
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                return if new_record? || user_offices.empty?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                total = user_offices.where(partnership_type: 'socio').sum(:partnership_percentage)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                # Allow a small margin of error for decimal precision issues (e.g., 33.33%  3 = 99.99%)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                return if (99.98..100.02).cover?(total)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                errors.add(:base, 'A soma das porcentagens de participao dos scios deve ser 100%')
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
              1
            

            

              def team_must_exist
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                errors.add(:team_id, 'deve existir') unless Team.exists?(team_id)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            end
          
      213.

      58.

            class Phone < ApplicationRecord
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # Soft delete support (if you're using paranoia gem)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              acts_as_paranoid if defined?(Paranoia)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # Polymorphic association
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              belongs_to :phoneable, polymorphic: true
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              validates :phone_number, presence: true,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                                       format: { with: /\A\+?[\d\s\-\(\)]+\z/ }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # Normalize phone number before saving
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              before_save :normalize_phone_number
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # Scopes for querying
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              scope :for_offices, -> { where(phoneable_type: 'Office') }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # scope :for_companies, -> { where(phoneable_type: 'Company') }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              scope :for_customers, -> { where(phoneable_type: 'ProfileCustomer') }
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              scope :mobile, -> { where('phone_number LIKE ?', '%9%') } # Brazilian mobile pattern
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              scope :landline, -> { where.not('phone_number LIKE ?', '%9%') }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              # Instance methods
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              def formatted_number
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Brazilian phone formatting
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                clean = phone_number.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                case clean.length
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                when 10 # (11) 1234-5678
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  "(#{clean[0..1]}) #{clean[2..5]}-#{clean[6..9]}"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                when 11 # (11) 91234-5678
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  "(#{clean[0..1]}) #{clean[2..6]}-#{clean[7..10]}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  phone_number # Return as-is if doesn't match expected patterns
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              def mobile?
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                # Brazilian mobile numbers have 9 as the first digit after area code
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                clean = phone_number.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                clean.length == 11 && clean[2] == '9'
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def whatsapp_link
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                clean = phone_number.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                clean = "55#{clean}" unless clean.start_with?('55') # Add Brazil country code
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                "https://wa.me/#{clean}"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              private
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              def normalize_phone_number
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # Remove all non-numeric characters for storage
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                self.phone_number = phone_number.gsub(/\D/, '') if phone_number.present?
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            end
          
      77.

            class Power < ApplicationRecord
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              enum :category, {
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Trs procedimentos principais
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                administrative: 0,    # Administrativo
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                judicial: 1,          # Judicial
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                extrajudicial: 2      # Extrajudicial
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # Relacionamentos
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              belongs_to :law_area, optional: true
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              belongs_to :created_by_team, class_name: 'Team', optional: true
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              validates :description, presence: true
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              validates :category, presence: true
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              validates :law_area, presence: true, if: :specific_power?
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              # Scopes para diferentes tipos de poderes
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              scope :base_powers, -> { where(is_base: true) }
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              scope :specific_powers, -> { where(is_base: false).where.not(law_area_id: nil) }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              scope :custom_powers, -> { where.not(created_by_team_id: nil) }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              scope :system_powers, -> { where(created_by_team_id: nil) }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              # Scopes por procedimento
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              scope :administrative_powers, -> { where(category: :administrative) }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              scope :judicial_powers, -> { where(category: :judicial) }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              scope :extrajudicial_powers, -> { where(category: :extrajudicial) }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              # Mtodos helper
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def base_power?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                is_base?
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              def specific_power?
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                !is_base? && law_area_id.present?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def custom_power?
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                created_by_team_id.present?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              def system_power?
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                created_by_team_id.nil?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              def full_description
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                if specific_power? && law_area
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  "#{category.humanize} (#{law_area.full_name}) - #{description}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                else
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  "#{category.humanize} - #{description}"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              # Mtodos para herana de poderes
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              def self.for_area(area)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return all if area.nil?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                # Se  rea principal, retorna poderes base + especficos da rea
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                if area.main_area?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  base_powers.where(category: category).or(where(law_area: area))
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                else
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Se  subrea, busca poderes especficos da subrea primeiro
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  specific_powers = where(law_area: area)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  # Depois busca poderes da rea pai que no tm verso especfica na subrea
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  parent_descriptions = specific_powers.pluck(:description, :category)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  inherited_powers = where(law_area: area.parent_area)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                                       .where.not([:description, :category] => parent_descriptions)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  # Combine poderes base + especficos + herdados
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  base_for_category = base_powers
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  where(id: (base_for_category + specific_powers + inherited_powers).map(&:id).uniq)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              def applicable_to_area?(target_area)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                return true if law_area.nil? && is_base? # Poderes base se aplicam a tudo
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                return true if law_area == target_area
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # Se o poder  da rea pai,  aplicvel s subreas
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                return true if target_area&.sub_area? && law_area == target_area.parent_area
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                false
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              end
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            end
          
      114.

            class ProceduralParty < ApplicationRecord
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              include DeletedFilterConcern
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              acts_as_paranoid
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              # Associations
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              belongs_to :procedure
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              belongs_to :partyable, polymorphic: true, optional: true
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              # Enums
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              enum :party_type, {
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                plaintiff: 'plaintiff',
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                defendant: 'defendant'
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              validates :party_type, presence: true
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              validates :name, presence: true, if: -> { partyable.blank? }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              validate :partyable_or_name_present
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              validate :only_one_primary_per_type
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

    58. 
            

            

              # Scopes

    60. 
            

            

              scope :defendants, -> { where(party_type: 'defendant') }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              scope :primary, -> { where(is_primary: true) }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              scope :ordered, -> { order(:position, :created_at) }

              def display_name
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                if partyable.present?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  partyable.try(:full_name) || partyable.try(:name) || 'Unknown'
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  name
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              def identification
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                if partyable.present?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  partyable.try(:cpf) || partyable.try(:cnpj) || cpf_cnpj
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                else
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  cpf_cnpj
          
      82.

      83.

              end
          
      84.

              def is_customer?

                partyable_type == 'ProfileCustomer'

    87.

              end
          
      104.

              private
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              def set_defaults
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                self.is_primary = false if is_primary.nil?
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              def set_position
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                return if position.present?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                max_position = procedure.procedural_parties
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                                 .where(party_type: party_type)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                                 .maximum(:position) || 0
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                self.position = max_position + 1
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              def partyable_or_name_present
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                return unless partyable.blank? && name.blank?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                errors.add(:base, 'Either a partyable reference or a name must be present')
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              def only_one_primary_per_type
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                return unless is_primary?
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                existing_primary = procedure.procedural_parties
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                                     .where(party_type: party_type, is_primary: true)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                                     .where.not(id: id)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                                     .exists?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                return unless existing_primary
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                errors.add(:is_primary, "already exists for #{party_type}")
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            end
          
      139.

            #

            class Procedure < ApplicationRecord
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              include DeletedFilterConcern
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              acts_as_paranoid
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              # For hierarchical tree structure
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              # NOTE: If you get "undefined method has_ancestry", restart Rails server after bundle install
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              # The ancestry gem needs to be loaded properly
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              has_ancestry if defined?(Ancestry)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62.

              # Associations

              has_many :procedural_parties, dependent: :destroy

              has_many :plaintiffs, -> { where(party_type: 'plaintiff') }, class_name: 'ProceduralParty'

              # Validations
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

              validates :procedure_type, presence: true
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

              validates :status, presence: true
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              validates :system, inclusion: { in: SYSTEMS }, allow_blank: true
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

              validates :competence, inclusion: { in: COMPETENCES }, allow_blank: true
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              validates :priority_type, inclusion: { in: PRIORITY_TYPES }, allow_blank: true, if: :priority?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              validates :claim_value, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

              validates :conviction_value, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              validates :received_value, numericality: { greater_than_or_equal_to: 0 }, allow_nil: true
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132.

              # Scopes
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              scope :active, -> { where(status: ['in_progress', 'paused']) }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

              scope :completed, -> { where(status: 'completed') }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              scope :archived, -> { where(status: 'archived') }
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

              scope :with_priority, -> { where(priority: true) }
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              scope :judicial, -> { where(procedure_type: 'judicial') }
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              scope :administrative, -> { where(procedure_type: 'administrativo') }
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              scope :extrajudicial, -> { where(procedure_type: 'extrajudicial') }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              # Ancestry scopes - only if ancestry is available
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              if defined?(Ancestry)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                scope :root_procedures, -> { roots }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                scope :child_procedures_of, ->(procedure) { children_of(procedure) }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

              else
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                scope :root_procedures, -> { where(ancestry: nil) }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                scope :child_procedures_of, ->(procedure) { where(ancestry: procedure.id.to_s) }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

              end
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              # Nested attributes

              accepts_nested_attributes_for :procedural_parties, allow_destroy: true

    155. 
            

            

              accepts_nested_attributes_for :honoraries, allow_destroy: true

              # Instance methods

    158. 
            

            

              def display_name
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                "#{procedure_type.humanize} - #{number || 'Sem nmero'}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

              def location
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                return nil unless city.present? || state.present?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                [city, state].compact.join(' - ')
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168.

              def has_financial_values?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                claim_value.present? || conviction_value.present? || received_value.present?
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              def financial_summary
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  claim: claim_value || 0,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  conviction: conviction_value || 0,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  received: received_value || 0,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  pending: (conviction_value || 0) - (received_value || 0)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                }
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

              def add_plaintiff(partyable_or_name, **attributes)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                build_party('plaintiff', partyable_or_name, attributes)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def add_defendant(partyable_or_name, **attributes)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                build_party('defendant', partyable_or_name, attributes)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              def primary_plaintiff
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                plaintiffs.find_by(is_primary: true) || plaintiffs.first
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              def primary_defendant
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                defendants.find_by(is_primary: true) || defendants.first
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              def has_children?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                if respond_to?(:children)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  children.any?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                else
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  Procedure.where(ancestry: id.to_s).any?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def root_procedure
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                if respond_to?(:root?)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  root? ? self : root
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                else
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  ancestry.nil? ? self : Procedure.find_by(id: ancestry.split('/').first)
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              end
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

            
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              def all_descendants
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                if respond_to?(:descendants)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  descendants
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                else
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                  Procedure.where('ancestry LIKE ?', "#{id}/%")
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

              end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              # Create a child procedure
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

              def create_child_procedure(attributes = {})
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                if respond_to?(:children)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  children.create(attributes.merge(work: work))
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                else
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                  Procedure.create(attributes.merge(work: work, ancestry: id.to_s))
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

              end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              private
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              def set_defaults
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                self.status ||= 'in_progress'
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              def build_party(party_type, partyable_or_name, attributes)
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                party_attributes = attributes.merge(party_type: party_type)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                if partyable_or_name.is_a?(String)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  party_attributes[:name] = partyable_or_name
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                else
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  party_attributes[:partyable] = partyable_or_name
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

            
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                procedural_parties.create!(party_attributes)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

            end
          
      248.
