            #  id                  :bigint           not null, primary key
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            #  active              :boolean          default(TRUE), not null
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            #  end_date            :date
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            #  notes               :text
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            #  relationship_type   :string           default("representation")
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            #  start_date          :date
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            #  created_at          :datetime         not null
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            #  updated_at          :datetime         not null
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            #  profile_customer_id :bigint           not null
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            #  representor_id      :bigint
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            #  team_id             :bigint
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            #
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            # Indexes
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            #
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            #  index_represents_on_active                          (active)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            #  index_represents_on_profile_customer_id             (profile_customer_id)

            # Foreign Keys

    30. 
            

            

            #
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            #  fk_rails_...  (profile_customer_id => profile_customers.id)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            #  fk_rails_...  (representor_id => profile_customers.id)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            #  fk_rails_...  (team_id => teams.id)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            class Represent < ApplicationRecord
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              belongs_to :profile_customer
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              belongs_to :representor, class_name: 'ProfileCustomer'
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              belongs_to :team
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              # Enums
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              enum :relationship_type, {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                representation: 'representation', # Full legal representation (for unable persons)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                assistance: 'assistance',         # Legal assistance (for relatively incapable)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                curatorship: 'curatorship', # Court-appointed curator
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                tutorship: 'tutorship' # Court-appointed tutor
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              # Validations
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              validates :relationship_type, presence: true
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              validates :representor_id, uniqueness: {
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                scope: [:profile_customer_id, :active],
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                conditions: -> { where(active: true) },
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                message: 'j est representando este cliente'
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              validate :validate_representor_capacity
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              validate :validate_dates
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              validate :prevent_self_representation
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              # Scopes
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              scope :active, -> { where(active: true) }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              scope :inactive, -> { where(active: false) }
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              scope :current, lambda {
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                active.where('start_date IS NULL OR start_date <= ?', Date.current)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  .where('end_date IS NULL OR end_date >= ?', Date.current)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              }
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              scope :by_team, ->(team_id) { where(team_id: team_id) }
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              scope :for_customer, ->(customer_id) { where(profile_customer_id: customer_id) }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              scope :by_representor, ->(representor_id) { where(representor_id: representor_id) }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              # Callbacks
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              before_validation :set_defaults
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              after_create :notify_compliance_if_needed
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              after_update :notify_compliance_on_changes
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              private
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

              def set_defaults
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                self.start_date ||= Date.current
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                self.team_id ||= profile_customer&.customer&.teams&.first&.id
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def validate_representor_capacity
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                return unless representor
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                return unless representor.capacity != 'able'
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                errors.add(:representor_id, 'deve ser legalmente capaz (maior de 18 anos)')
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

              def validate_dates
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                return unless start_date.present? && end_date.present?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                return unless end_date < start_date
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                errors.add(:end_date, 'no pode ser anterior  data de incio')
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              def prevent_self_representation
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                return unless profile_customer_id == representor_id
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                errors.add(:representor_id, 'no pode representar a si mesmo')
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              def notify_compliance_if_needed
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                # Notify compliance team when a new representation is created
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                return unless ['unable', 'relatively'].include?(profile_customer.capacity)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                create_compliance_notification('new_representation')
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              def notify_compliance_on_changes
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                # Notify compliance team when representation is deactivated
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                return unless saved_change_to_active? && !active
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                create_compliance_notification('representation_ended')
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              def create_compliance_notification(notification_type)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                return unless team
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                ComplianceNotification.create!(
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  notification_type: notification_type,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  title: notification_title(notification_type),
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  description: notification_description(notification_type),
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  status: 'pending',
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  team: team,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  resource_type: 'Represent',
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  resource_id: id,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  metadata: {
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    profile_customer_id: profile_customer_id,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    representor_id: representor_id,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    relationship_type: relationship_type,
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    active: active
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                )
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to create compliance notification: #{e.message}"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

              end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

              def notification_title(type)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                case type
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                when 'new_representation'
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  "New #{relationship_type} established"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                when 'representation_ended'
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  "#{relationship_type.capitalize} terminated"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  'Representation status changed'
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              def notification_description(type)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                customer_name = profile_customer&.full_name
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                representor_name = representor&.full_name
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                case type
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                when 'new_representation'
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  "#{representor_name} is now the #{relationship_type} for #{customer_name}"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                when 'representation_ended'
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  "#{representor_name} is no longer the #{relationship_type} for #{customer_name}"
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  'Representation relationship updated'
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            end
          
      166.

    app/models/services/customers.rb

            class Customers

                def configure_profile(profile, flags)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  profile.customer = create_customer(profile.emails.first.email)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  save_profile(profile)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  NewCustomerEmailMailer.notify_new_customer(profile.customer).deliver_later if flags[:flag_access_data]

                end
          
      11.

                private

                def create_customer(email)

    15. 
            

            

                  Customer.create(
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    email: email,
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    password: 'Cliente123#',
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    password_confirmation: 'Cliente123#'
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  )

    20. 
            

            

                end

              end

    app/models/services/generate_docs.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            class GenerateDocs
          
      4.

              class << self
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                def config_aws
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  Aws.config.update(
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                    {
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                      region: 'us-west-2',
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                      credentials: Aws::Credentials.new(
          
      10.

                        ENV.fetch('AWS_ID', nil),

                def prepare_documents
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  config_aws
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  doc = retrieve_document
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # aqui vo os templates para todos os tipos de documentos
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  doc.paragraphs.each do |p|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    p.each_text_run do |tr|
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      tr.substitute('_qualify_', 'Qualificao uma')
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29.

            class Work < ApplicationRecord

              def total_honorary_value

              attribute :work_events do |object|

              attribute :created_at_date do |object|

                object.created_at.to_date.iso8601

              end

    52.

      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    status: I18n.t(document.status, scope: 'activerecord.attributes.document.statuses'),
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    format: document.format,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55.

      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

            class LawAreaSerializer

              attribute :parent_area do |object|

    app/serializers/office_with_lawyers_serializer.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    19 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 19 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class OfficeWithLawyersSerializer
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include JSONAPI::Serializer
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              attributes :name, :quote_value, :number_of_quotes, :total_quotes_value
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              attribute :lawyers do |object|
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Get users with OAB (lawyers) associated with this office
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                lawyers = object.users.where.not(oab: [nil, ''])
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                lawyers.map do |lawyer|
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  user_office = object.user_offices.find_by(user: lawyer)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  profile = lawyer.user_profile
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  {
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    id: lawyer.id,
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    email: lawyer.email,
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    oab: lawyer.oab,
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    name: profile&.name || lawyer.email.split('@').first,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    partnership_type: user_office&.partnership_type,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    partnership_percentage: user_office&.partnership_percentage
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  }
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            end
          
      25.

                  .where.not(id: object.id)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  .includes(:representor)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  .map do |represent|
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  {
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    id: represent.id,
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    representor_name: represent.representor&.full_name,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    representor_cpf: represent.representor&.cpf,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    relationship_type: represent.relationship_type,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    start_date: represent.start_date
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  }
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              def self.format_address(profile_customer)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                return nil unless profile_customer.addresses.any?
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                address = profile_customer.addresses.first
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                {
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  street: address.street,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  number: address.number,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  neighborhood: address.neighborhood,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  city: address.city,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  state: address.state,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  zip_code: address.zip_code
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                }
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            end

                private

                def capacity_changed_manually?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # Check if there's a PaperTrail version for this change
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  return false unless profile_customer.versions.any?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  last_version = profile_customer.versions.last
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  return false if last_version.changeset['capacity'].blank?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  @previous_capacity = last_version.changeset['capacity'][0]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  @new_capacity = last_version.changeset['capacity'][1]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  true
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                def create_manual_change_notification
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  title = determine_notification_title
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  description = build_notification_description
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Get team from customer's teams (using first team if multiple)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  team = profile_customer.customer&.teams&.first
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  return unless team # Skip if no team associated
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  ComplianceNotification.create!(
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    notification_type: 'manual_capacity_update',
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    title: title,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    description: description,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    status: 'pending',
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    team: team,
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    resource_type: 'ProfileCustomer',
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    resource_id: profile_customer.id,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    metadata: {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      previous_capacity: previous_capacity,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      new_capacity: new_capacity,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      changed_at: Time.current.to_s,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      age: calculate_age
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    }
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  )
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                def determine_notification_title
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  case new_capacity
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  when 'able'
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    'Customer capacity changed to fully capable'
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  when 'relatively'
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    'Customer capacity changed to relatively incapable'
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  when 'unable'
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    'Customer capacity changed to unable'
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    'Customer capacity updated'
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                def build_notification_description
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  age_info = profile_customer.birth.present? ? " (Age: #{calculate_age})" : ''
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  "#{profile_customer.full_name} (CPF: #{profile_customer.cpf})#{age_info} " \
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    "has had their capacity manually changed from '#{previous_capacity}' to '#{new_capacity}'. " \
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    'This change may be due to medical or legal reasons. ' \
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    'Please review and update all related documents and legal procedures.'
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                def calculate_age
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  return nil if profile_customer.birth.blank?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  today = Date.current
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  age = today.year - profile_customer.birth.year
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  age -= 1 if today < profile_customer.birth + age.years
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  age
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            end
          
      89.

    app/services/customers/mail/mailjet_service.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            # This module is destinated to hold commom basic Mailjet configurations and methods
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # to be used in other services
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            #
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            # it contains the following methods:
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            # - mailjet_service: returns the Mailjet::Send class
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            # - from: returns the default sender email and name
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            # - template_language: returns true if the template language is enabled
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            # - sandbox_mode?: returns true if the environment is development or test, it prevents email's from being sent while validating its payload.
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            # - call: sends the email using the Mailjet API
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            #
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            # [Mailjet API Documentation](https://dev.mailjet.com/email/guides/send-api-v31)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            module Customers::Mail::MailjetService
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              def mailjet_service

              def from
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                { Email: 'contato@brunopellizzetti.com.br', Name: 'Procstudio' }

              end
          
      22.

              def template_language

              def sandbox_mode?

      30.

    31. 
            

            

              # Sends the email using Mailjet service.
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # @message (Hash): the email payload
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # @message[:From] (Hash): the sender email and name
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              # @message[:To] (Array): the recipient email and name
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # @message[:TemplateID] (Integer): the template ID
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              # @message[:TemplateLanguage] (Boolean): the template language
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              # @message[:Subject] (String): the email subject
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # @message[:Variables] (Hash): the email variables
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              #
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              # Returns:
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              # - If successful, returns the response from Mailjet service.
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

              # - If an error occurs, logs the error message and returns nil.
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              def call
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                mailjet_service.create(
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  messages: [message],
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  sandbox_mode: sandbox_mode?
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                )
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              rescue RestClient::BadRequest => e
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("[Mailjet Delivery Error]: #{e.message}")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            end
          
      52.

                def merge_with_current(current_data, draft_data)

                def should_save_draft?(data)

    52. 
            

            

                  return false if data.blank?

    54.

                def sanitize_data(data)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  data.deep_transform_values do |value|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    case value
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    when String
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      value.strip
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    when Array
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      value.compact_blank
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      value
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end

                def find_active_draft(draftable, form_type, user, customer)

    71.

    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73.

    75.

    76.

      77.

      78.

              def clean_zip_code(zip_code)

              def gender_check(profession)

                def word_for_gender(text, gender)

            class S3UploadManager
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def self.upload_file(file, record, attachment_name, file_name = nil, content_type = nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                file_name ||= file.original_filename
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                company_name = 'pellizzeti_walber' # Aqui vai ser uma variavel em algum momento
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                key = "#{Rails.env}/#{company_name}/#{record.class}/#{record.id}/#{SecureRandom.uuid}-#{file_name}"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                content_type ||= file.content_type
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                record.send(attachment_name).attach(io: file,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                                    filename: file_name,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                                                    content_type: content_type,
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                                                    key: key)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            end

              def generate

              attr_reader :name, :email

    22. 
            

            

              def generate_base_subdomain
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                # Prioridade: nome do advogado > email (parte antes do @)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                if name.present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  normalize_string(name)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                elsif email.present?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  email_prefix = email.split('@').first
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  normalize_string(email_prefix)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                else
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  'escritorio'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              def normalize_string(str)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                str.to_s
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  .unicode_normalize(:nfkd) # Remove acentos
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  .gsub(/[^\x00-\x7F]/, '')                   # Remove caracteres no-ASCII
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  .downcase                                   # Minsculas
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  .gsub(/[^a-z0-9\s]/, '') # S letras, nmeros e espaos
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  .strip # Remove espaos das bordas
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  .gsub(/\s+/, '-').squeeze('-') # Remove hfens duplicados
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  .gsub(/^-|-$/, '') # Remove hfens das bordas
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  .presence || 'escritorio' # Fallback se ficar vazio
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def ensure_unique_subdomain(base_subdomain)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                return base_subdomain unless Team.exists?(subdomain: base_subdomain)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Se j existe, adiciona nmero at encontrar um nico
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                counter = 1
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                loop do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  candidate = "#{base_subdomain}#{counter}"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  return candidate unless Team.exists?(subdomain: candidate)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  counter += 1
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Segurana para no fazer loop infinito
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  break if counter > 9999
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Fallback com timestamp se chegou no limite
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                "#{base_subdomain}#{Time.current.to_i}"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            end
          
      64.

                def mask_cnpj(cnpj)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  return '' if cnpj.blank?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # Remove any non-digit characters
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  digits = cnpj.to_s.gsub(/\D/, '')
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  # Make sure we have exactly 14 digits
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  return '' if digits.length != 14
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Format as XX.XXX.XXX/XXXX-XX
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  "#{digits[0..1]}.#{digits[2..4]}.#{digits[5..7]}/#{digits[8..11]}-#{digits[12..13]}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48.

                def word_for_gender(text, gender)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  I18n.t("gender.#{text}.#{gender}")

    118.

                def lawyers_text

    122.

    123.

    125. 
            

            

                    text.push(word_for_gender(lawyer.civil_status, lawyer.gender))
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    text.push("OAB n #{lawyer.oab&.strip}")
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    text.push(word_for_gender(lawyer.nationality, lawyer.gender))
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end

    137.

                def substitute_justice_agents(text)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  translated_text = if office.present?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                                      [
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                                        lawyers_text, "integrante da #{office.name&.strip} inscrita sob o CNPJ #{office.cnpj}",
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                                        "com endereo profissional  Rua #{office.street.to_s.downcase.titleize&.strip}", office.number.to_s, office.neighborhood.downcase.titleize&.strip,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                                        "#{office.city&.strip}-#{office.state&.strip}", "e endereo eletrnico #{office&.emails&.first&.email&.strip}"
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

                def substitute_job(text)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  translated_text =
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    work.procedures.map do |procedure|

      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169.

                  translated_text[0] = "#{'Procedimento'.pluralize(translated_text.size)} #{translated_text.first}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  translated_text[-1] = "#{translated_text[-1]}: "
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171.

      172.

      173.

                                       "#{Work.human_enum_name(:subject,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                                                               work.subject).downcase.titleize} - #{Work.human_enum_name(:social_security_areas,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                                                                                                                         work.social_security_areas).downcase.titleize}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                                     else
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177.

    178.

      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179.

                def bank_information(resource)

      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62.

                def rate_text
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  case honorary.honorary_type
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  when 'bonus'
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    'Nada a ser pago'
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  when 'work'
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    if honorary.work_prev.present? && honorary.parcelling_value.present?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      "O(A) advogado(a) receber o valor de #{number_to_currency(honorary&.fixed_honorary_value)} (#{Extenso.moeda(honorary.fixed_honorary_value.to_f)}) e #{honorary.work_prev} (#{Extenso.numero(honorary.work_prev)}) benefcios previdencirios em #{honorary&.parcelling_value&.to_i} (#{Extenso.numero(
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        honorary.parcelling_value.to_i, 1
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      )}) parcelas de igual valor e com mesmo vencimento a partir da assinatura deste documento"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    elsif honorary.work_prev.present? && honorary.parcelling_value.blank?
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      "O(A) advogado(a) receber o valor de #{number_to_currency(honorary&.fixed_honorary_value)} (#{Extenso.moeda(honorary.fixed_honorary_value.to_f)}) a vista e #{honorary.work_prev} (#{Extenso.numero(honorary.work_prev)}) benefcios previdencirios"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    elsif honorary.parcelling_value.present?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      "O(A) advogado(a) receber o valor de #{number_to_currency(honorary&.fixed_honorary_value)} (#{Extenso.moeda(honorary.fixed_honorary_value.to_f)}) em #{honorary&.parcelling_value&.to_i} (#{Extenso.numero(
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        honorary.parcelling_value.to_i, 1
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      )}) parcelas de igual valor e com mesmo vencimento a partir da assinatura deste documento"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    else
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      "O(A) advogado(a) receber o valor de #{number_to_currency(honorary&.fixed_honorary_value)} (#{Extenso.moeda(honorary.fixed_honorary_value.to_f)}) a vista"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  when 'success'
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    "O(A) advogado(a) receber o valor de #{number_to_percentage(honorary&.percent_honorary_value,
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                                                                                 precision: 2)} dos benefcios brutos advindos deste processo"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  when 'both'
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    if honorary.work_prev.present? && honorary.parcelling_value.present?
          
      85.

      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        honorary.parcelling_value.to_i, 1
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                      )}) parcelas de igual valor e mais um valor varivel de #{number_to_percentage(
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                        honorary&.percent_honorary_value, precision: 2
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89.

      90.

      91.

                def substitute_word(text)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  proc_date = I18n.l(Time.zone.now, format: '%d de %B de %Y')

      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  text.substitute('_proc_full_name_', customer.full_name.upcase)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  text.substitute('_proc_lawyer_full_name_', lawyers.first.full_name.upcase)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158.

      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159.

                  S3UploadManager.upload_file(file, document, :original, file_name, content_type)

      37.

                def substitute_word(text)

              def save_signed_file(document, s3_document)

                downloaded_file = Down.download(s3_document)

              def update_document_to_signed(document)
          
      113.

              def set_capacity_based_on_age(record, value)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                return if value.blank?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                return unless record.respond_to?(:capacity=)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  date = Date.parse(value.to_s)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  age = calculate_age(date)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  record.capacity = case age
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                                    when 0..15
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                                      'unable' # Menor absolutamente incapaz
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                                    when 16..17
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64.

      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                                    else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66.

    67.

      68.
