              def calculate_age(birth_date)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                today = Date.current
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                age = today.year - birth_date.year
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                age -= 1 if today < birth_date + age.years
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                age
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

              def valid_cpf?(cpf)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                return false if cpf.nil?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Remove non-numeric characters
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                cpf_numbers = cpf.to_s.gsub(/[^0-9]/, '')
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                # CPF must have 11 digits
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                return false unless cpf_numbers.length == 11
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # Check for known invalid CPFs (all same digits)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                return false if cpf_numbers.chars.uniq.size == 1
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Calculate first check digit
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                sum = 0
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                9.times { |i| sum += cpf_numbers[i].to_i * (10 - i) }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                first_digit = ((sum * 10) % 11) % 10
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                return false unless first_digit == cpf_numbers[9].to_i
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # Calculate second check digit
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                sum = 0
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                10.times { |i| sum += cpf_numbers[i].to_i * (11 - i) }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                second_digit = ((sum * 10) % 11) % 10
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                second_digit == cpf_numbers[10].to_i
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            end

    lib/helpers/credentials_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    6 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 6 lines missed.

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module CredentialsHelper
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def self.get(*keys)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                env_var = keys.last.is_a?(String) ? keys.pop : nil
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                Rails.application.credentials.dig(Rails.env.to_sym, *keys) || (env_var ? ENV.fetch(env_var) : nil)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              end
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            end
          
      9.
